Killing a black frog in a dream indicates a great victory over the misfortunes and problems that a person will face. It also indicates the end of a bad friendship and shows the achievement of goals and the attainment of all desires. With ease. Killing a frog is also a sign of the patient’s recovery from any disease he suffers from. After all, killing a frog indicates getting rid of the injustice that happened to the fortuneteller. Also, a pregnant woman seeing a large, wild frog that wants to bite her is evidence of the presence of bad people in the world. Her life and when she kills him is evidence of getting rid of these people. This may be a sign of great kindness and an upcoming journey for the young man. While he sees the little frog trying to bite, he runs away from it. Evidence of the difficulties that the young man will face soon and he must be patient until these difficulties pass. And when the young man sees a frog in his house and plays with it, it means that It indicates great comfort, tranquility, and great livelihood for the fortuneteller and his family. title: Interpretation of a dream about distributing chocolate to single women in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing the distribution of chocolate in a dream for a single girl: When a single girl dreams that someone she did not know before offered her chocolate and she took it happily. This vision analyzes the dream that will illuminate her life, and she will live days full of love, happiness, and optimism in the coming time. But if she sees a single girl in her dream That someone she loves and has a relationship with gave her chocolate, and she is looking at him with love. This dream indicates that this girl will soon get engaged. This person will propose to her soon and she will live a happy life with him. Whereas if this girl sees in her dream that she refuses to eat chocolate from someone close And she was unhappy. This indicates that this girl faces worries and problems in her life and is trying to end everything but she fails. If an unmarried girl dreams in a dream that her mother gave her daughter chocolate and she cried in the dream. The dream gives an interpretation of the near comfort and that she will get rid of all the crises that She goes through it and finds her life soon. See also: Interpretation of dreams about eating chocolate for unmarried women. Interpretation of watching the distribution of chocolate in a dream for a married woman. When a married woman sees in her dream that her husband is giving her chocolate, she is very happy. This opinion is due to the interpretation that this woman will live a beautiful and satisfying life With her husband, and that she is a woman who takes care of her home and supports her husband, and her morals are high, and her upbringing is good. When a married woman sees in her dream that someone gave her chocolate and this woman did not know him before. It indicates that this woman will hear happy news in the next few days with the news of her pregnancy soon, God willing. While if a married woman saw in her dream that her father had given her chocolate, that woman would also be happy and happily adventurous. This indicates that this woman in the dream loves her family. And that her father will live long, and that he will be a good and righteous father and loved among men. But when she saw In a dream that someone gave her chocolate, but she was unhappy. This indicates that she is upset in her life, and is facing difficult financial circumstances. But he will get rid of these problems soon. Interpretation of seeing chocolate distributed in a dream for men and its meaningIf one sees in his dream that a friend gives chocolate to him A person and takes him with love. The vision indicates that this person will live a happy period. He will be blessed with a lot of money, and good sustenance will come his way in the coming days. The interpretation of a man’s dream is that his wife did a job for him by surprising him with chocolate beans. This vision indicates that this person will find work And it works. The work will prove and he will stand out among employers and gain respect. The man also had this dream that he did not want to take chocolate from someone and he was unhappy with the dream. This interpretation shows that this man will think a lot about the concerns and how to solve them. And the debts that have accumulated on him and he could not Pay it off easily. If the vision in the dream is that this man takes chocolate from a human being, and this man is very tired in the dream. This means that he will get sick and tired in his body, but he will gradually improve

title: Interpretation of seeing a lamp in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a lamp in a dream through the vision website roy2a.com To see a lamp in this dream indicates goodness, justice, piety, and staying away from forbidden things. It indicates the fulfillment of wishes and good news, and breaking or burning a lamp indicates problems, disagreements, or distancing oneself from God. This applies to a married woman or the pain of some imams such as Imam Ibn Shirin, Al-Nablishi, Imam Al-Sadiq and other contemporary translators, so follow us on the Roya website. What is Imam Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing a lamp in a dream? Seeing a lamp in a dream means repentance and returning to God. Seeing a large lamp In a dream, it indicates good deeds, piety, and good character. Seeing a lit lamp in a dream indicates the end of anxiety and anxiety and the improvement of material and psychological conditions. Seeing a lamp going out in a dream means losing hope in a certain thing or the death of someone important to the dreamer. See also: Interpretation of seeing the light of a lamp in a dream. Dream: What is the interpretation of seeing a lamp in a dream for a single woman? Seeing a bright lamp in a dream for an unmarried woman indicates positive energy and faith for the girl and achieving success and success in her life. The narration of extinguishing the lamp in a dream for a girl indicates stumbling in her life and loss of hope, and it may indicate breaking off the engagement or Not obtaining a university degree or keeping one distance from God. See also: Interpretation of seeing light in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing a lamp in a dream for a married woman? Seeing a white lamp in a dream for a married woman indicates her happiness and stability in her family. Seeing a lit lamp in a dream for a married woman indicates kindness Her husband, his success in his work, and his good relationship with his family. If a married woman sees a bright lamp in a dream, this indicates the eruption of problems and disagreements with her husband. See also: Interpretation of a projector in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing a lamp in a dream for a pregnant woman? Seeing a bright lamp for a pregnant woman indicates a safe pregnancy. And the fetus and the ease of its birth, and a bright lamp indicates the birth of a child that will have a great relationship in old age. If a pregnant woman sees that the lamp is burning or breaking, this indicates difficulty during pregnancy and childbirth and health problems after birth. What is the interpretation of seeing a lamp in a dream for a divorced woman? Seeing a woman A divorced woman with a glowing lamp in a dream indicates her return to her ex-husband and the goodness of her life. A divorced woman seeing a large lamp in a dream means that the doors of goodness will open for her, success and success, as well as the goodness of her life. What is the interpretation of a dream of turning on lights? If one sees himself lighting it Status lamps, as this indicates wealth after poverty, and guidance after sins and transgressions. Seeing a lit electric lamp in a dream indicates success and success in academic or professional life. Seeing lights being turned off in the house in a dream indicates a reform of the situation, piety, and the collapse of disputes and quarrels. See also Interpretation of seeing a candle or candles in a dream: What is the interpretation of a dream about a lamp exploding? Seeing lamps exploding in a dream for a married woman indicates many marital problems.

title: Interpretation of seeing falafel in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing falafel in a dream. Falafel is falafel, which is beans, onions, vegetables, garlic, and spices. Seeing it in a dream indicates kindness, increased profit, and family and family stability. In this article, we will explain the interpretation of a dream about falafel in the dream of an unmarried young man, a married man, and a woman, whether she is single, married, pregnant, or For widows, as well as for divorced women, this is done by providing interpretations by senior imams of interpretation. In visions and dreams, such as Imam Muhammad Ibn Sirin, past and present, follow us on the Roya website. What is the interpretation of seeing falafel in a dream according to Imam Ibn Sirin: Seeing falafel in a dream for a man indicates good abundance and increased profit. If a married man sees his wife preparing falafel, it indicates family ties and the collapse Problems. A vision of spicy food that announces halal money. Seeing buying falafel in a dream indicates wealth and self-sufficiency. Seeing falafel for a young man indicates the fulfillment of desires. Seeing beans and falafel in a dream indicates the fulfillment of desires and the desired goal. What is the interpretation of seeing falafel in a dream for a married woman: Seeing falafel and bread in A married woman’s dream indicates halal nutrition and an abundance of goodness. Seeing a married woman buying falafel in a dream indicates happiness and stability in her married life. If a married woman sees that her husband bought her falafel, it indicates a lot of profits, profits, or promotion at work. What is the interpretation of seeing falafel in a dream for a woman? Single woman: Seeing them eating falafel in a single woman’s dream indicates receiving money from a prestigious job. Seeing yourself grinding falafel in a single woman’s dream indicates her academic excellence if she is a student or her promotion at work if she is an employee. If an unmarried woman sees that she shares taste with someone, remember the approach Her engagement. What is the interpretation of seeing falafel in a dream for a pregnant woman: The dream of buying falafel in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates the ease and ease of childbirth. Seeing a pregnant woman in a dream eating hot falafel indicates the fulfillment of her desire and the birth of a desired child, whether it is a boy or a girl. Seeing buying dough Falafel in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates comfort and stability in her life, easy childbirth, and the end of fatigue. What is the interpretation of seeing falafel in a dream for a divorced woman: If a divorced woman sees that she is eating hot falafel, it indicates freedom from worries and problems. Seeing buying falafel dough in a dream for a divorced woman indicates an abundance of goodness and a lot of sustenance in life. Next season. What is the interpretation of a dream about fried falafel: Seeing fried falafel in a dream indicates the fulfillment of a dream or goal that the dreamer sought to achieve. Seeing a fried falafel job in a married man’s dream indicates effort and fatigue to earn money. What does it mean to see yourself eating a delicious sandwich? Seeing buying delicious sandwiches In a dream, a single young man indicates the approach of his marriage or engagement. If a pregnant woman sees that she is buying a sandwich with fava beans and falafel, she remembers that she has given birth to a male child. Seeing buying fava beans and falafel sandwiches in a dream for a single woman indicates her marriage to a generous man. We are pleased on the site to receive your dream with “Interpretation of a Falafel Dream” “

What is the interpretation of a dream about fried falafel: Seeing fried falafel in a dream indicates the fulfillment of a dream or goal that the dreamer sought to achieve. Seeing a fried falafel job in a married man’s dream indicates effort and fatigue to earn money. What does it mean to see yourself eating a delicious sandwich? Seeing buying delicious sandwiches In a dream, a single young man indicates the approach of his marriage or engagement. If a pregnant woman sees that she is buying a sandwich with fava beans and falafel, she remembers that she has given birth to a male child. Seeing buying fava beans and falafel sandwiches in a dream for a single woman indicates her marriage to a generous man. We are pleased on the site to receive your dream with “Interpretation of a Falafel Dream” “

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a kiss on the head in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq.

preview.html: Interpretation of the dream of seeing someone kissing the head in a dream through the interpretation of the books of Imam Al-Sadiq or Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi or Ibn Shaheen and Ibn Kathir for the married, pregnant and divorced woman, where the kiss from the son to the parents or to one of the parents shows justice and obedience to the parents, and it also indicates the woman’s love for her husband if he is from the wife to Her husband, and the kiss indicates the satisfaction of her desires, success in professional life, marital and family stability, and it can indicate the need for feelings of love and romance, and we will explain this in detail. The interpretation of seeing a kiss on the head in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a kiss on the head in a dream according to Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin says Sirin: The kiss you dream of shows a person’s need for attention, love, and the search for feelings. If you see that you are seeing people in a kissing position, this means that you are interfering in the lives of others and want to know a lot about the details of their personal lives. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a kiss on the head of a single woman. Kissing a mother’s head in A girl’s dream means hearing good news. If she sees that a stranger is kissing her head, this may indicate that she will get married soon. Kissing the head of a father, mother, or uncle can indicate interconnected family and family relationships, and a girl’s obedience to her family and respect for morals and customs. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a married woman Kissing the head Kissing the mother's head is considered a good sign, pregnancy may occur soon or she will hear good news. A kiss on the husband's head shows affection, mutual love and marital stability. Kissing the heads of children is a sign of love, care and many responsibilities as it indicates happiness and family stability. And seeing her kissing the head It indicates the religiosity of the wife and the strength of her faith. Interpretation of dreams to see the head kissing a divorced woman. A kiss shows the need for romantic feelings and love. A kiss on the head shows loyalty. A kiss on the cheek indicates hearing good news and the disappearance of fears and sorrows. Kissing someone who fights with elements of reconciliation. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a kiss on Head of a pregnant woman: If you see a beautiful person kissing her, this indicates an easy birth, and if you see an ugly person kissing her, this indicates a faltering birth, and the kiss, which indicates love, tenderness, and family stability and satisfaction. Of desires. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a man kissing the head. If a man sees himself kissing the head of a person known to be a manager at work or a famous person, this may mean the fulfillment of a long-awaited desire and it may mean victory over enemies. Seeing him kissing the head of a beautiful woman is a sign of wishful thinking and financial stability. It is considered Kissing the father of a son or child is an indication of family stability and cohesion. A kiss on the mother’s head indicates kindness, success in life, and material and moral stability. Kissing the head of a dead person indicates the use of his money, knowledge, or righteous offspring. Other interpretations of your vision kissing the head. Kissing the head of a dead person in a dream is one of the visions that Jurists differ regarding the dream and their meanings. Kissing the head is obedience and goodness in morals and religion. Also, kissing a dead person on the head indicates the abundance of money and livelihood that the dreamer obtains from it.

title: What is the interpretation of seeing a dead person wearing a white dress?

preview.html: However, many great commentators see that the deceased is wearing a white dress in a dream, this basically explains the special state of opinion, and here are the details through our translator.Interpretation of seeing the dead wearing a white dress in a dream for a single girlIf an unmarried girl sees in a dream that the deceased is wearing a dress White. The dream may indicate good news and may indicate marriage. If the deceased is seen wearing a white dress and he is happy in the dream. The vision indicates success at work, and perhaps success in studies. If he sees that the deceased wants to give the unmarried girl a white dress in... A dream. This vision shows marriage and happiness, God willing. Whereas if she sees the deceased wearing a white dress, and looks at him in amazement in the dream. This vision may indicate good things that will come to her in the coming days. If he sees the deceased wearing a white dress, then he is also sad in the dream. The vision may indicate that Ali will benefit from many things in her life, but after her brilliance. Commentators believe that the white dress is worn by the deceased or a family member in the dream. This indicates the good deeds performed by the person who had the vision. See also: Interpretation of a dream about reburying the deceased. Interpretation Seeing the dead wearing a white dress in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman sees the deceased in a dream wearing a white dress. The dream may indicate the status she will reach among her family in waking life. But if she sees the deceased wearing a white dress and he is happy in the dream. The vision may indicate happiness. And the compatibility between her and her husband in her life. If he sees that in a dream the deceased is wearing a white dress. This vision shows that she is a good wife and works to please her husband. And if he sees the deceased or wearing a white dress and he is happy in the dream. The dream may indicate that the deceased wants someone to pray for him. His family. If a married woman sees that the dead person is wearing a white dress, and around him there are many happy foundations in Al-Munawi. The vision can indicate happy news and pleasant events. Senior commentators believe that seeing a dead person wearing a white dress in a dream. It is a vision that foretells and does not warn, that is, it Good in all circumstances for a married woman. Interpretation of seeing the deceased wearing a white dress in a dream about the man and its meaning. If a married man sees the deceased wearing a white dress in a dream. The vision can indicate multiple associations, but depending on the situation in which it is found. If he sees the deceased wearing a dress White, and he was happy with it in the dream. The vision indicates the marriage of one of the children, and perhaps a happy event in general. While if he sees that the deceased is wearing a white dress and many people around him in the dream. The vision may indicate that you hear good news. If he sees that the deceased is wearing a dress White, and he was not satisfied with this dress in the dream. The dream may indicate some actions taken by the founder and these actions are undesirable. But if the deceased was wearing a white dress, and he was troubled by it in the dream. The vision may indicate an illness, and it is not a serious illness, but rather it is an illness. Natural and God Almighty

title: Interpretation of a house in a dream The meaning of seeing a house in a dream

preview.html: Seeing a house, whether new or old, buying, selling, cleaning, washing, demolishing, the old girl, the young woman, the single woman, the married woman, the pregnant woman, the divorced woman, the single young man and the married woman, on the authority of Ibn Sirin and Imam al-Sadiq. Interpretation of the new in a dream. The house in a dream includes safety, family, family and marriage. It also means returning from travel, safety after fear, and helping the family and family. Seeing a new house means a cohesive and strong house, unlike the old, dilapidated house. If you dream that you are visiting your old house, you will hear good news that you will be happy about. If you see your old house in ruins, this warns you of illness or death. One of your relatives. As for a girl, this dream is a dream of sadness. You will lose a dear friend. If you go to your home and find everything comfortable and happy, this means harmony in your current home life and convincing results at work. A man’s home is his hidden wife in the house where he takes refuge, and it is said that so-and-so entered his home if He got married, so he calls her that because she is in him, and for him. The door is the vagina or her face. Perhaps his house also indicates his body, and the service house is his servant, the wheat storehouse, and his mother, who was the reason he lived on milk for growth and nutrition. Perhaps it indicates the wife alone with him to fulfill his needs, without his son and the rest of his family members. And the person who looks out the window of his house indicates that he is watching his wife’s vagina or anus, and there is no decrease, increase, demolition, or repair that returns to the original in him. It is as if I saw as if I had built a new house. If he is sick, he wakes up and his body is healthy. Likewise, if there is a sick person in his house, he shows his kindness, except If it is his custom to bury those who died for him in his home, then this is the grave of the sick person in the home, especially if he. It was built in a weak place, or it was painted white, or it blew flowers or two scents into the house at that time, so what does bad luck mean? If there is no sick man, he gets married if he is single, or he marries his daughter and takes her with him if she is old, Or he buys a condominium depending on the size and seriousness of the house. If you dream of a house, there will be wise changes in your current affairs. If you dream that you have an elegant house, it means that you will soon leave your house for a better house and good luck will be with you. Dilapidated houses and failure in business or in any Work and deviation in health. A dark house is a woman of bad character, and if a woman sees it, so does a man. Whoever dreams that he enters a house and sprinkles it, a woman hits it like wet and mud, then it is removed and repaired. Whoever dreams that his house is more spacious than it was, then good intentions will extend to him and he will receive goodness from the woman. He was seen carving or decorating a house, bringing it into strife and confusion, and a bright house is a sign of the kindness of women and their good morals. Whoever sees walls in need of repair is a man of knowledge or a departed imam. Whoever sees people throwing them, then he has friends who accuse him of something. Whoever dreams of a wall or something falling on him has committed many sins. And his punishment is quick and a crack in the wall or branch, the fate of one of the two of his house, like earrings and nipples. Whoever sees its walls being studied is a man.

title: Interpretation of a dream about giving birth to a beautiful girl

preview.html: The girl is the soul of her father. A girl can be a complete life for all family members, and this is what we will show you through our website gptafser.com/, so follow us. Interpretation of seeing the birth of a beautiful girl in a dream about a single girl. When an unmarried girl sees that she is giving birth to a beautiful girl, this is a sign It is great that the psychological state will improve a lot. This vision is also a good sign that problems will disappear from her life and that she will overcome crises, and God Almighty is high. When an unmarried woman gives birth in her dream, and the baby is a beautiful girl, this is a sign that good and happy news will reach her, God willing. Seeing an unmarried woman giving birth to a beautiful girl is considered a good sign that she is a girl working to bring her closer to God Almighty, and that she enjoys her wonderful purity. A beautiful girl in a dream about a virgin may be a sign of approaching engagement, and God knows best. And a virgin who gives birth to a girl with black skin indicates That he is her future husband. She will be a respectable man who God will do justice to, and that God has responded to her pleading with Him. When a girl sees that she sees in her dream the presence of a virgin girl who is still giving birth in her dream. An indication of his good morals and that he is close to God. In contrast to seeing her wearing a girl who is not Beautiful in appearance, this is a warning that she will fall into the ordeal she is exposed to. She must pray to God to save her from all harm and evil. If the Virgin sees herself pregnant with a girl, it shows that the things she dreams of and desires will come true by God’s command. Pregnancy is for a girl. A single woman in a dream foretells for her that she will have a wonderful future that will witness prosperity, God willing. Sadness in her sleep when a girl is wearing this is not good for her. And because it is a warning from a man who is not suitable for her, she will communicate with him and must be careful. See also: Interpretation of dreams about giving birth to a beautiful daughter For a pregnant, married, and single woman: Interpretation of seeing the birth of a beautiful girl in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman dreams that she is giving birth to a beautiful girl. A beautiful sign that she is blessed with happiness and that her married life is full of love and stability. Also, when she sees her giving birth to a beautiful girl, this is good news for her husband in his field of work because he will get A big promotion, God willing. A woman who has children sees herself in a dream giving birth to a beautiful girl. A sign that she will become pregnant soon, and the fetus may be female, and only God knows. A married woman who sees this dream is good news about her death. And the end of the sorrows that She was present in her life and was the reason for her heartache. When a woman who is delaying childbearing or who has not yet given birth has this dream, this indicates that she will become pregnant soon, God willing. God knows best. The birth of a girl with dark and beautiful skin symbolizes this woman’s love for cooperation and helping others. Also Her children have good morals and academic excellence, God willing. If the girl breastfeeds after giving birth, this is a sign of pregnancy in the coming period, and God knows best. But if she sees in a dream that she is giving birth to a girl who is not beautiful in appearance, this may be a warning that she will go through crises and problems in her life. Accordingly, To preserve the word

title: Learn about the signs of envy in a dream according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Signs of envy in a dream: There is no doubt that envy is one of the visions that raise panic and fear in the heart, and envy in general is hated in the text of the prominent verses and hadiths, and in this article we examine in more detail all the signs and dreams that express envy and their interpretation. Signs of envy in a dream: Envy is an abomination with no good in it, and whoever sees envy and does not envy, this indicates salvation from evil and hatred, salvation from evil and danger, and obtaining food and security. Among the visions that indicate envy is that the dreamer is being robbed or that he sees a thief entering his house. And he took something with him while he was outside. Wood is also considered a sign of envy, because wood symbolizes the hypocritical enemy who hides his hatred and envy, and a person causes hostility out of jealousy and spite, as well as holes that express envy, whether the hole is in the garment. , the wall or the body. Among the visions that indicate envy is also the vision of the pentagram, as some have said that most geometric shapes show magic and envy, and fire is also evidence of envy, just as the damage resulting from fire is evidence of evil, hatred and evil. Envy. Signs of envy in Ibn Sirin’s dream. Ibn Sirin sees in envy a sign of rejection of the conspiracy of envy, the invalidity of his actions, and the corruption of his intentions. Whoever sees himself envious, this symbolizes vanity, the damage that befalls him, and the obstacles that stand between him and his desires. Among the signs of envy in a dream is that the dreamer sees The color yellow is one of the hated colors that indicate hidden hatred and intense envy. Among the visions that also indicate envy is seeing poison, whether the dreamer eats or drinks from it, or his food is poisoned, or he is poisoned in general. Signs of envy in a single woman’s dream. Among the visions that are considered a sign of envy for a girl An unmarried woman sees pins and needles in her dream, and this vision shows evil people and those who hold grudges and hatred towards her, hide hostility towards her, and conceal their envy. Her hinders her efforts and disturbs her hopes. If she sees a stranger or a stranger pricking her with a needle, this is a sign of envy, and she may feel jealous while she is awake, or be bewitched by someone who hates her and does not want her to be good or profitable. He sees nausea or vomiting, then this is evidence of envy and hatred. Likewise, if he sees a woman blowing or blowing on her face, then this is evidence that he is jealous of her, harbors hatred and contempt for her, and conspires against her, and devise tricks and schemes to set her up. Signs of envy in a married woman’s dream: Signs of envy towards a woman A married woman may see her hair falling out a lot without intervention, and if she sees someone touching her hair and it falling out automatically, or seeing a strange woman pulling her hair forcefully or a man looking at her. Her hair and its falling out are all evidence of magic and envy. If she sees insects in her bed or in her house, this is a sign of intense envy, and some may seek to separate her from her husband. The yellow color for a woman is evidence of envy and invincible magic, especially if she sees herself wearing yellow or things surrounded by yellow, and the connotations of this color include illness and distress. Signs of envy in a divorced woman's dream when she sees someone stealing from her, stealing from her, or...

Envy. Signs of envy in Ibn Sirin’s dream. Ibn Sirin sees in envy a sign of rejection of the conspiracy of envy, the invalidity of his actions, and the corruption of his intentions. Whoever sees himself envious, this symbolizes vanity, the damage that befalls him, and the obstacles that stand between him and his desires. Among the signs of envy in a dream is that the dreamer sees The color yellow is one of the hated colors that indicate hidden hatred and intense envy. Among the visions that also indicate envy is seeing poison, whether the dreamer eats or drinks from it, or his food is poisoned, or he is poisoned in general. Signs of envy in a single woman’s dream. Among the visions that are considered a sign of envy for a girl An unmarried woman sees pins and needles in her dream, and this vision shows evil people and those who hold grudges and hatred towards her, hide hostility towards her, and conceal their envy. Her hinders her efforts and disturbs her hopes. If she sees a stranger or a stranger pricking her with a needle, this is a sign of envy, and she may feel jealous while she is awake, or be bewitched by someone who hates her and does not want her to be good or profitable. He sees nausea or vomiting, then this is evidence of envy and hatred. Likewise, if he sees a woman blowing or blowing on her face, then this is evidence that he is jealous of her, harbors hatred and contempt for her, and conspires against her, and devise tricks and schemes to set her up. Signs of envy in a married woman’s dream: Signs of envy towards a woman A married woman may see her hair falling out a lot without intervention, and if she sees someone touching her hair and it falling out automatically, or seeing a strange woman pulling her hair forcefully or a man looking at her. Her hair and its falling out are all evidence of magic and envy. If she sees insects in her bed or in her house, this is a sign of intense envy, and some may seek to separate her from her husband. The yellow color for a woman is evidence of envy and invincible magic, especially if she sees herself wearing yellow or things surrounded by yellow, and the connotations of this color include illness and distress.
